list.name: Changes
list.comment: Configure Firebase hosting with static export. Updated `.gitignore`, added Firebase configuration files (`firebase.json`, `.firebaserc`), and static `404.html` and `index.html` templates. Adjusted `next.config.ts` for static build compatibility.

task.summary: Implement core functionalities for course tracking. Introduced tab navigation, course addition with customizable review intervals, localStorage persistence, and task planning logic with overdue and upcoming reviews. Enhanced UI/UX with interactive components and TailwindCSS styling.
Introduce user profiles with semester tracking. Added new types, onboarding modal, and semester-specific course filters. Enhanced UI with updated headers and profile management.
Add university suggestions for autocompletion in user profile form. Enhanced input with `datalist` functionality for better usability.

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: Add university suggestions for autocompletion in user profile form. Enhanced input with `datalist` functionality for better usability.

task.summary: Integrate Firebase for authentication and Firestore database. Added user authentication with Google, profile management syncing with Firestore, and real-time course updates. Enhanced UX with loading states and error handling.

Configure Firebase hosting with static export. Updated `.gitignore`, added Firebase configuration files (`firebase.json`, `.firebaserc`), and static `404.html` and `index.html` templates. Adjusted `next.config.ts` for static build compatibility.

MESSAGE.value: Implement core functionalities for course tracking. Introduced tab navigation, course addition with customizable review intervals, localStorage persistence, and task planning logic with overdue and upcoming reviews. Enhanced UI/UX with interactive components and TailwindCSS styling.
Introduce user profiles with semester tracking. Added new types, onboarding modal, and semester-specific course filters. Enhanced UI with updated headers and profile management.
Add university suggestions for autocompletion in user profile form. Enhanced input with `datalist` functionality for better usability.

Integrate Firebase for authentication and Firestore database. Added user authentication with Google, profile management syncing with Firestore, and real-time course updates. Enhanced UX with loading states and error handling.

Configure Firebase hosting with static export. Updated `.gitignore`, added Firebase configuration files (`firebase.json`, `.firebaserc`), and static `404.html` and `index.html` templates. Adjusted `next.config.ts` for static build compatibility.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
